lines.text: Three words - I Love You - sometimes as beautiful and sacred as a prayer - sometimes a cowardly lie.
Then years of bondage - sorrowful - sordid...
Well, Pansy, - it's like this. The Queen sent me to tell you she was havin' a coupla dames to tea.
Dames - ? - L A D I E S ! !
You heard me, Violet! I said DAMES!

[to Gabrielle]
Mrs. Fontaine does not allow her books to be taken from this room.
Now, Buttercup - you know that's the bunk - the Duchess don't even know she has a book.

[to Gabrielle]
I've been dying to talk to you alone - I just knew we would be drawn to each other. You see I understand so thoroughly - for I, too, have been pursued all my life! My husband can't give me any information about these things - he's like a babe in the woods - - he's a traveling man. Now tell me - is it true that all men - -? - - and do you poor dears have to - -?
